title: Paneer with spinach
description: This is a wonderful velvety dish with large, fresh cubes of paneer. There are just enough spices for a good background flavour and aroma.
ingredients: thumb-sized piece of fresh ginger, peeled and sliced into long julienne
250g/8¾oz ready-made paneer (available from some supermarkets and Asian grocers), cut into cubes
6 tbsp whole milk, or 4 tbsp double cream
1-2 tsp lemon juice, or to taste
